title: Honor level 1
body: I got to honor level 1 right at the start of the new honor system and was wondering if it's even possible at all to get back to lvl 2?

replies.body:
Like Michi said, it is very strange how you started at level 1 when everyone was supposed to start at level 2 at the VERY beginning of the new honour system. 

And yes, you will be able to climb back up to level 2 and even level 5 :) As long as you don't get reports for negative attitude etc. 

You don't even need to get honours or be 'fake' in game to get honours, just show sportsmanship and some teamwork ez pz to level up :)

Also playing heaps helps you level up faster !

If you got honor level 1 when the honor system were first implemented then it must be a bug because Riot made that everyone starts at level 2 and if you got demoted to level 1 then  yes its still possible to get back to level 2 although it may or may not be equilivant to getting honor level 3. So try being more positive (if you are naturally ) then just play friiendly or what not.
